data.name: barButtonItemSupportForum
data.value: This opens a web browser window that directs you to the Metalogix Support Forum.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsTransformersTCTransformation_barMenuAddTransformerLinkText
data.value: custom_transformations_using_ps.html

data.name: barButtonItemReplicator
data.value: This will open an in-product information window for Metalogix Replicator.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsComponentsTCCertificateInclusionConfig
data.value: This allows you to select and set any security Certificates that may be required to connect to SharePoint in your environment.

data.name: barCheckItemSecondExplorer
data.value: This option displays a second Explorer View in the main window. If the option is not selected, only one Explorer View (one tree view) will be displayed.

data.name: barButtonItemTwitter
data.value: This opens a web browser window to the Metalogix Twitter page.

data.name: barButtonItemFacebook
data.value: This opens a web browser window to the Metalogix Facebook page.

data.name: barButtonItemContactSupport
data.value: This opens an Email window so you can send a message directly to Metalogix Support.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsProxyTCProxyConfigw_cbProxyLinkText
data.value: configuring_proxy_settings.html

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsComponentsTCCertificateInclusionConfigLinkText
data.value: connecting_with_certificates.html

data.name: barButtonItemResetSticky
data.value: This will reset the currently set migration configuration options back to the default settings, even if the preserve setting option is selected.

data.name: barButtonItemUpdateLicence
data.value: This opens a window that allows you to update your current license key.

data.name: barCheckItemEnableSticky
data.value: This option preserves any changes and setting configurations for most migration actions.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsThreadSettingsEditorSetting
data.value: This will open a window that allows you to change the throttling setting for migration actions.

data.name: barButtonItemAbout
data.value: This opens the About window and provides details about you current version of Content Matrix Console.

data.name: barButtonItemBlog
data.value: This opens a web browser window to the Metalogix Blog page.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsTransformersEnableCustomTransformersSetting
data.value: This option will allow custom transformers to be used with Content Matrix as part of a migration.

data.name: barButtonItemStoragePoint
data.value: This will open an in-product information window for Metalogix StoragePoint.

data.name: UpdateAgentHelpTooltip
data.value: This action will update the Content Matrix Console, license file, and all mapping files on the selected Agent with copies from this installation.

data.name: barButtonItemLinkedIn
data.value: This opens a web browser window to the Metalogix LinkedIn page.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsProxyTCProxyConfigw_cbProxy
data.value: This Tab allows you to set any Proxy connection information that may be required to connect to SharePoint in your environment.

data.name: barButtonItemRefresh
data.value: Refreshes all current connections.

data.name: barCheckItemShowJobsList
data.value: This option will make the Job List visible at the bottom of the main window. If the option is not selected, the Job List will not be visible.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsTransformersTCTransformation_barMenuAddTransformer
data.value: This option allows you to add any custom transformer actions that you may have into the migration process. A transformer action must be manually configured beforehand. Transformers allow you to programmatically modify migrated objects during migration.

data.name: barButtonManageActionTemplates
data.value: This opens a new window that allows you to manage different configuration templates for Content Matrix actions.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsMetabaseMetabaseSettingsEditorSetting
data.value: This will open a new window that allows you to select the storage type and location used for data associated with specific connections.

data.name: barButtonItemUpdateCheck
data.value: This will use your internet connection to check with Metalogix to see if there is a more recent build of Content Matrix that is available to download.

data.name: barCheckItemShowCheckBoxes
data.value: A set of checkboxes will be displayed in front of each node, under each connection. This is to help with multi-select features.

data.name: MetalogixUIWinFormsShowAdvancedSetting
data.value: Enables advanced right click menu features that are not needed by most users. For more information, please search for 'Advanced Mode' in Help Topics

data.name: barButtonItemMetalogixAcademy
data.value: This will open an in-product information window for Metalogix Academy.
